gameCore

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameCore.Character
      • gameCore.Player

  • public class Player
extends Character
    A Character is a superclass for all of the animated creatures inside the game. Player, and Monsters (subclass of NPC) are subclasses of character.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group D, Main author: Karen Madore Group D Members --------------- Karen Madore Trang Pham Darrell Penner

      • pickUpItem

        public boolean pickUpItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Pickup method picks up the item on the current tile Pick up the item and add it to the player's inventory if the itemName exists
        Parameters:
        itemName - is the string of the item.
        Returns:
        true if the item was picked up, false if the item does not exists.

      • drop

        public boolean drop(java.lang.String itemName)
        Drop method drops the item
        Parameters:
        itemName - String name of the item to drop
        Returns:
        true if the item was dropped successfully, false if the item does not exists.

      • look

        public boolean look(Direction direction,
           java.lang.StringBuffer output)
        Look method any characters it sees in direction requested. If it is a wall in that direction, indicate it. If an exit is there but is locked, then get the key that is required.
        Parameters:
        direction - to move
        Returns:
        string of characters it sees

      • viewInventory

        public java.lang.String viewInventory()
        ViewInventory method returns an string representation of the player's inventory
        Returns:
        a list of items in the player's inventory as a string

      • adjustHealth

        public void adjustHealth(int value)
        Override the adjustHealth of the Character class to provide player with ability to notify PlayerStatusPlanel of updates
        Overrides:
        adjustHealth in class Character
        Parameters:
        value - - a negative value decreases the player's health, a positive value increases the player's health

      • addPlayerListener

        Allow external classes to subscribe to the PlayerEvents
        Parameters:
